mapper.select: select a.first_num , a.second_num , a.third_num , a.fourth_num , a.fifth_num , a.sixth_num from lotto_numbers a

select a.round_no , a.first_num , a.second_num , a.third_num , a.fourth_num , a.fifth_num , a.sixth_num , a.bonus_num , a.draw_date from lotto_numbers a where a.round_no = #{roundNo} order by a.round_no
select a.round_no from lotto_numbers a order by draw_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into lotto_numbers ( round_no, first_num, second_num, third_num, fourth_num, fifth_num, sixth_num, bonus_num, draw_date ) values ( #{roundNo}, #{firstNum}, #{secondNum}, #{thirdNum}, #{fourthNum}, #{fifthNum}, #{sixthNum}, #{bonusNum}, #{drawDate} )
